ygData.subject: Re: Loosing exp when dying
ygData.msgSnippet: I brought up this subject on the Stratics EQ chat room (irc.stratics.com  #Everquest) and it was pretty much agreed that the level of the MOB that kill you
ygData.messageBody:
I brought up this subject on the Stratics EQ chat room (irc.stratics.com #Everquest) and it was pretty much agreed that the level of the MOB that kill you has, at least, some effect on experience loss. In fact, a couple of the higher level players in the chat room (both of them claimed to be 30+) came back with an absolute YES. The thinking is that at lower levels (say 6-15), the level of MOB that would probably kill you is going to be higher than you. At these levels, "blues" are not difficult to defeat. At higher levels, MOBS than con blue to you (meaning lower level than you) are far more dangerous and can easily kill your character. Even some "greens" are capable of defeating your character at high levels. This may be part of the reason why people experience much greater experience loss at high levels and would also explain why some people lose more experience than others at certain levels (which has, so far, been attributed to race/class).

For what it's worth, I have personally not seen any evidence that the above is true. My main character is only a level 10 shaman, so I don't get killed by "blues" very often.

Munk

-----Original Message-----
From: shane0009@... [mailto:shane0009@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 8:42 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dying


RE: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dyingyou start losing exp at level 6
the amount you lose increases each level
----- Original Message -----
From: Whitmore, Lance
To: 'EverQuest@onelist.com'
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 10:19 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dying


This is just a guess but i think its your level that is used to calculate. It seems that the higher you are the more experience you lose. You dont lose any until you reach lvl 5, after that it seems to increase with each lvl.

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: scott@... [mailto:scott@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 10:13 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dying



From: scott@...

I saw someone write somewhere that the exp you loose depends on the monster that kills you. Such as if you die from a monster that is many levels below you, you loose more exp. Is this true?

Azboklin the enchanter
